name: passninja-guestlist-gas
description: A repository for the PassNinja Google Apps Script demo to demonstrate PassNinja API functionality.

scripts.js2gs: for f in *.js; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.gs"; done
scripts.gs2js: for f in *.gs; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.gs}.js"; done
scripts.build:docs:fns: jsdoc2md --files core.js build.js services.js virtualization.js > docs/FUNCTIONS.md
scripts.build:all: yarn build:docs:utils && yarn build:docs:api && yarn build:docs:fns
scripts.build:docs: yarn js2gs > dev/null 2>&1 || yarn gs2js && yarn build:all && yarn js2gs

hooks.pre-commit: yarn build:docs && yarn lint:fix && yarn test && git add .

author: PassNinja
